title: Creamy Cavatappi & Cheese
directions: Cook cavatappi according to package directions.
Meanwhile, saute garlic in butter in a Dutch oven. Stir in flour and pepper sauce until blended; gradually add milk. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Stir in cheeses until melted; add green onions. Drain cavatappi; stir into cheese mixture.
Transfer to a greased 13x9-in. baking dish. Combine the bread crumbs, bacon and melted butter; sprinkle over top.
Bake, uncovered, at 350Â° for 20-25 minutes or until bubbly. Sprinkle with green onion and, if desired, pepper. Yield: 10 servings.
ingredients: 6 cups uncooked cavatappi or spiral pasta
6 cups (24 ounces) shredded sharp cheddar cheese
3 thick-sliced bacon strips, cooked and coarsley crumbled
